header.mainHeading: Eurovia-m – precision and reliability in your tire maintenance
header.text: We offer quick tire replacement, professional repair, retreading, and convenient tire storage. Our goal is to ensure that your car tires are always ready for any journey – safely and reliably. Eurovia-m, your partner on every road!

welcomeSection.text: We offer everything from tire replacement and repair to retreading and safe tire storage. At Eurovia-m, your safety and satisfaction are always our priority!

headings.text: We use modern tools and technologies to ensure the best quality of your car's tire maintenance and repair. Trust us, so you can enjoy a safe and smooth ride.

promises.promiseText: We always offer services with the best price-quality ratio
Professional and friendly approach to every customer
We only use reliable methods and materials to ensure your satisfaction

serviceCards.serviceDescription: Quick and precise tire replacement to get your vehicle ready for any journey.
Professional service that ensures the safety and reliability of truck tires.
Extend the life of your tires with quality retreading to save your money and the environment.
We repair your tires quickly and reliably so you can move forward worry-free.
Store your off-season tires safely and comfortably in our tire hotel.

aims.aim: Precision and speed in every service
A team that cares about your car's needs

textSection.text: If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to contact us. We are here to help!

heading: Our journey since
section1.text: EUROVIA-M started operating in the Estonian market in 1995, offering a wide range of tire-related services. The company’s long-term experience in truck tire retreading has enabled it to establish reliable partnerships with both local and international clients. Since 2002, we have held the international quality certification ISO 9001, which confirms the high qualifications of our employees, technological capabilities, and a responsible warranty system. We remain committed to quality and innovation.

heading: Our
mission
– quality and environmental sustainability
section2.text: EUROVIA-M’s goal is to provide transport companies with high-quality, environmentally friendly, and cost-effective tire solutions. Our work helps extend tire lifespan, reduce waste generation, and promote responsible business practices in the transport sector.

heading: Vision
– to be the leading tire solution provider
section3.text: Our vision is to become the leading provider of tire retreading and maintenance services in the region, offering innovative solutions that support both our customers and environmental well-being. EUROVIA-M aims for continuous technological development and maintaining customer trust through impeccable service and quality.

contact.secondaryHeading: We look forward to your questions or comments

servicePages.heading: Car Tire Change
servicePages.mainText: Changing car tires is an important task for every driver, ensuring both vehicle safety and optimal driving comfort. Seasonal tire changes are not only required by law but also a practical way to adapt the vehicle to weather conditions, offering better traction and reducing the risk of accidents.
servicePages.secondaryText: Our service ensures a fast, convenient, and high-quality tire change for all types of cars. Additionally, we offer a wide range of supplementary services that make vehicle maintenance easy and reliable.
listItems: Professional change process – we use modern equipment to avoid damaging the tires or rims.
Balancing – after each change, we balance the tires to prevent vibration and extend the tire life.
Tire condition assessment – we check the tread depth and overall condition of the tires, offering advice on purchasing new tires when necessary.

servicePages.heading: Truck Tire Change
servicePages.mainText: Changing truck tires is crucial for every transport company. Truck tires are constantly under heavy load and wear from long-term use, making timely tire changes key to ensuring smooth operations and safety.
servicePages.secondaryText: Our team specializes in truck tire changes, providing high-quality service and professional advice.
listItems: Special equipment for large tires – we perform tire changes quickly and efficiently, regardless of their size or type.
Balancing and fuel efficiency – properly balanced tires reduce vibration, fuel consumption, and uneven tire wear.
Personalized advice – we help you select the right tires based on your truck's load and operational areas.

servicePages.heading: Retreading
servicePages.mainText: Retreading is an economical and environmentally friendly way to extend tire life. EUROVIA-M has been operating in Estonia since 1995 and specializes in retreading, offering the highest quality services supported by modern technology and long-term experience. Retreading means replacing the worn tread with a new one, restoring the tire's original functionality and appearance. This process is significantly cheaper than buying a new tire and helps save valuable resources. In addition, it extends tire life, reduces waste, and supports environmental sustainability.
servicePages.secondaryText: EUROVIA-M offers a full retreading service, including innovative technologies and strict quality control procedures. Retreading is especially useful for transport companies wishing to reduce costs while maintaining vehicle and tire safety. Our long-term experience in this field makes EUROVIA-M a reliable partner.
listItems: Modern cold-vulcanization – we use cold vulcanization methods to ensure high quality and long-lasting retreaded tires.
100% inspection – each tire undergoes thorough quality control with a special high-pressure device to eliminate possible defects.
Warranty and reliability – each retreaded tire comes with a warranty pass and a one-year tread warranty.
Transport and logistics – we offer door-to-door transport, delivering and picking up tires. Our partners collect tires throughout Estonia to ensure speed and convenience.
ISO 9001 certification – the quality of our services is confirmed by an international certification that guarantees high standards and professionalism.

servicePages.heading: Tire Repair
servicePages.mainText: Tire repair is often a cost-effective and quick solution to restore damaged tires. Small damages, such as punctures or cuts, can cause significant headaches, but timely repair can prevent bigger problems and extend the tire's lifespan.
servicePages.secondaryText: EUROVIA-M offers high-quality and fast tire repair services to ensure your vehicle's safety and tire reliability.
listItems: Puncture and cut repair – we use high-quality materials to ensure tire durability after repair.
Valve and tire pressure check – we eliminate possible leaks and ensure correct tire pressure.
Safety-compliant quality – every repaired tire undergoes a thorough inspection to ensure vehicle safety.

servicePages.heading: Tire Hotel
servicePages.mainText: A tire hotel is a convenient and practical solution to save space and keep your tires in optimal condition during the off-season. EUROVIA-M's tire hotel is designed to provide maximum comfort and assurance that your tires are always in the best possible condition.
servicePages.secondaryText: We offer a comprehensive tire storage service, including both storage and maintenance.
listItems: Ideal storage conditions – we protect tires from moisture, temperature fluctuations, and sunlight to maintain their quality.
Tire condition check – before and after storage, we check the tire condition and perform maintenance work if necessary.
Ready-to-install tires – we prepare tires and keep them ready for the next season.
